title: Will Paolo Banchero play tonight vs. the Thunder?
text:
Paolo Banchero Injury Status & News: Magic vs. Thunder | December 19
The Magic will be without Paolo Banchero when they take on the Thunder at 7:00 PM ET on Thursday, December 19, as he has been ruled out with an injured oblique.
